channel.title: The Hon. Pam Bondi
channel.description: The Hon. Pam Bondi Attorney General, Florida and The Hon. Sam Olens Attorney General, Georgia (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: OLENS: As Attorneys General, we have been on the front line defending the Constitution ­ and the American people ­ from a President driven to exercise government power over our freedoms, our rights, and our lives.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: We know that the Constitution limits federal power, but President Obama clearly believes those limits just get in his way.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: So he ignores them. Time and again.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: He promises to rescue our economy and environment by investing in green jobs, but instead funnels tax dollars into campaign donors' pockets.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: He promised to have the most transparent administration in history but now refuses to come clean with Congress and the American people about Fast and Furious.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: BONDI: He talks about giving us more control over health-care decisions, but instead grants that power to government bureaucrats.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: He claims that government is responsible for private sector success, but the only thing he is building is bigger government.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: And Obamacare is Exhibit A.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: OLENS: It distorts our Constitution and endangers our fragile economy.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: We did everything in our power to stop it, taking the fight all the way to the United States Supreme Court. We prevailed on our two main arguments:
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: BONDI: The Court agreed that the Commerce Clause of the Constitution does not allow the federal government to force you to purchase a product you don't want.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: The Court agreed that the Constitution does not allow the federal government to force states to adopt a budget-busting expansion of Medicaid.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: OLENS: Then came the shocker: The Supreme Court upheld the individual insurance mandate by calling it something the President swore it never was ­ a tax.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: At every stage of the process, President Obama and Congressional Democrats promised us that the mandate was not a tax.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: Because they knew Americans were hurting, and the last thing we needed was another tax!
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: Because they knew ­ if the American public were told that Obamacare was just a massive tax hike, they wouldn't have a prayer of passing it.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: BONDI: Instead, President Obama and the Democrats called it a mandate. Then they turned around, and without a shred of shame, asked the Court to call the mandate a tax.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: Yet, the President can't bring himself to acknowledge publicly that the only reason his "'Unaffordable Care Act" still stands ­ is because it is a tax.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: This is what happens when a President has such total disregard for our individual liberty that he knowingly and purposely imposes unwarranted restrictions against the will of the people.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: This is not why our Founding Fathers risked their lives and their fortunes when they created a nation.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: This is not why young American men and women today risk their lives in defense of freedom.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: OLENS and BONDI: So, tonight, we ask you:
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: BONDI: Do you want skyrocketing health insurance premiums?
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: OLENS: Do you want enormous new financial burdens on young people who already shoulder our nation's crushing debt?
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: BONDI: Do you want the government to force individuals and religious institutions to violate the tenets of their faith?
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: OLENS: Do you want over $1 trillion in tax increases?
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: BONDI: Do you want a job-destroying insurance mandate that strangles businesses? OLENS: Do you want a federal government that tells you what to do, what to think, or what to buy when it comes to your health care?
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: BONDI: Do you want the federal government to steal hundreds of billions of dollars from Medicare to hide the true costs of Obamacare?
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: OLENS: Do you want more of this for four more years?
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: The health care lawsuit has reminded all of us that the Constitution limits the power of government.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: It has reminded us of the precious relationship between federalism and individual liberty.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: And though we fundamentally disagree with his decision, Chief Justice Roberts did observe that it is not the Supreme Court's "job to protect the people from the consequences of their political choices."
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: BONDI: It is our job to make a new choice.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: It is time to stand up and say, in a loud, clear voice, "Enough!"
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: It is time to repeal Obamacare!
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: It is time to stop those who ignore the Constitution when it's expedient!
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: It is time to remember that our rights are not a gift from government, but from God, and that by His grace we will defend them!
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: It is time for Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan.
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi

item.title: Thank you!
item.author: The Hon. Pam Bondi
